snippet: The state attorney general’s office said the Virginia Board of Health unlawfully stripped a provision holding abortion clinics to the same building standards as new hospital construction.
abstract: State attorney general’s office in Virginia refuses to certify new abortion clinic regulations, saying that the Virginia Board of Health unlawfully stripped a contested provision requiring clinics to meet the same strict architectural standards as new hospital construction.
lead_paragraph: The state attorney general’s office said the Virginia Board of Health unlawfully stripped a provision holding abortion clinics to the same building standards as new hospital construction.

headline.main: Virginia: State Office Says Board Erred in Nullifying an Abortion Law Provision
headline.print_headline: Virginia: State Office Says Board Erred In Nullifying An Abortion Law Provision
